SELECT dav.id, dav.version, dav.commit, da.code appCode, da.name appName, da.is_active appStatus, da.id appId, dav.creation_date FROM devops_application da RIGHT JOIN devops_app_version dav ON da.id = dav.app_id WHERE da.project_id = #{projectId}
AND da.id= #{appId}
AND
da.code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{appCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND
da.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{appName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND
dav.version LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{version, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND (da.code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR da.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR dav.version LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%'))

SELECT dap.version, dap.id versionId, lv.app_id FROM devops_app_version dap JOIN ( SELECT MAX( dappv.id ) id, dappv.app_id FROM devops_app_version dappv GROUP BY dappv.app_id ) lv ON lv.id = dap.id JOIN devops_application da ON lv.app_id = da.id
WHERE da.project_id = #{projectId};

SELECT dav.id, dav.version FROM devops_application da, devops_app_instance dai, devops_env de, devops_app_version dav WHERE da.id = dai.app_id AND de.id = dai.env_id AND dai.`status` = 'running' AND dai.app_version_id = dav.id AND da.project_id = #{projectId} AND de.id = #{envId} AND da.id = #{appId} GROUP BY dav.version
SELECT davv.value FROM devops_app_version dav, devops_app_version_value davv WHERE dav.value_id = davv.id AND dav.id = #{versionId}
SELECT dav.id, dav.version FROM devops_app_version dav WHERE 1 = 1 AND dav.app_id = #{appId} ORDER BY dav.id DESC
select dav.id, dav.version, dav.creation_date from devops_app_version dav where dav.app_id=#{applicationId} and dav.is_publish=1
SELECT dav.id FROM devops_app_version dav JOIN devops_application da ON da.is_active = TRUE AND da.id = dav.app_id WHERE dav.app_id = #{applicationId}
